thread.title: Vungle Appoints Howard Warner as Vice President of Finance and Business Operations

author: cnbc.com
title: Vungle Appoints Howard Warner as Vice President of Finance and Business Operations
text:
SAN FRANCISCO, Vungle , the leading performance marketing platform for in-app video ads, today announced Howard Warner has been appointed as Vice President of Finance and Business Operations. In his new role, Warner will oversee all finance, legal and international operations, and he will help execute Vungle's continued global expansion.
"Howard is joining at a pivotal time for Vungle. In the past year, we've experienced tremendous growth, released groundbreaking new products and expanded our operations around the world," said Rick Tallman, CEO of Vungle. "Howard will play a key role as we continue our rapid growth trajectory and execute against our strategic roadmap. He brings a wealth of experience and knowledge, and he will be a valuable addition to the team as we prepare for the next phase for the company."
"I'm thrilled to be joining Vungle and to be working with a team that has built such a successful global business," said Warner. "I look forward to leveraging my experience and contributing to Vungle's continued growth and success."
Prior to joining Vungle, Warner served on the Board of Directors as an advisor for Versaic, a leading provider of corporate social responsibility management solutions to Fortune 1000 companies. Additionally, as Chief Administrative Officer and Senior Vice President of Corporate Development at Reliance Globalcom Services (fka Yipes), Warner grew revenue from $26 million in 2004 to approximately $64 million in 2007 and led the negotiations for its successful exit.
Warner holds a bachelor's degree in Economics and Political Science as well as an MBA from the University of California, Berkeley. He also holds a Juris Doctor degree from Hastings College of the Law, San Francisco.
ABOUT VUNGLE
Vungle is the leading performance marketing platform for in-app video ads. Advertisers depend on Vungle's creative and LTV optimization technologies to reach and acquire high-value users worldwide. Top publishers rely on Vungle to generate revenue with engaging video ads that enhance the user experience.
Trusted by 50,000+ mobile apps worldwide, Vungle serves 4 billion video views per month on 1 billion unique devices and is consistently top-rated in user quality by global performance indexes. Vungle is backed by Google Ventures, Thomvest Ventures and Crosslink Capital. The company is headquartered in San Francisco with offices in London, Berlin, Beijing, Tokyo, Seoul and Singapore.
Learn more at www.vungle.com or follow @Vungle .
